system.description:
You have refined your mastery of the tales of the world and can seek new ones from even nature’s humblest creatures. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You may activate your Wild Shape ability by spending a use of Bardic Inspiration and vice versa.

  • While you are wildshaped, you are under a continuous speak with animals effect.
